name: Super Duper Chicken
description:
The chicken known as “Bob-Ralph” is running away from monsters. Play the part of the chicken and keep it safe.

Exclusive Features:

•Play as Bob-Ralph Chicken.

•Collect 100 Diamond to face the boss.

•Defend, Survive, and dodge in a multitude of levels.

•Cannons, Rockets & Bombs fire at you.

•Music plays in the background.
